mapper.insert: insert into plogging.tbl_user (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_phonenumber, user_gender, user_birth, user_img, user_point, user_email) VALUES(#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userPhonenumber}, #{userGender}, #{userBirth}, #{userImg}, #{userPoint}, #{userEmail})
mapper.select: select from plogging.tbl_course (course_number, course_name, course_detail, course_img_title, course_img_detail, course_difficulty, course_start, course_end) VALUES(#{courseNumber}, #{courseName}, #{courseDetail}, #{courseImgTitle}, #{courseImgDetail}, #{courseDifficulty}, #{courseStart}, #{courseEnd})

select from plogging.tbl_product (product_number, product_name, product_detail, product_price, product_color, product_size, product_category, product_popularity, product_review_numbers, product_inventory_total, product_inventory_sold) VALUES(#{productNumber}, #{productName}, #{productDetail}, #{productPrice}, #{productColor}, #{productSize} #{productCategory}, #{productPopularity}, #{productReveiwNumbers}, #{productInventoryTotal}, #{productInventorySold})
select from plogging.tbl_order (user_id, product_number, order_date) VALUES(#{userId}, #{productNumber}, #{orderDate})
select from plogging.tbl_product_review (user_id, product_number, review_detail, user_review_number) VALUES(#{userId}, #{productNumber}, #{reviewDetail}, #{userReviewNumber})
select from plogging.tbl_record (record_number, course_number, user_id) VALUES(#{recordNumber}, #{courseNumber}, #{userId})
select from plogging.tbl_review (review_number, course_number, user_id, review_content) VALUES(#{reviewNumber}, #{courseNumber}, #{userId}, #{reviewContent})

select from plogging.tbl_campaign (campaign_number, campaign_name, campaign_detail, campaign_img_title, campaign_img_detail, campaign_link) VALUES(#{campaignNumber}, #{campaignName}, #{campaignDetail}, #{campaignImgTitle}, #{campaignImgDetail}, #{campaignLink})
